locations.name: Dubrovnik
locations.description: Starting point of the tour, famous for its medieval city walls, limestone streets of the Old Town, and stunning Adriatic views.

locations.name: Hvar
locations.description: Croatia's sunniest island, known for its sophisticated charm, harbour-side strolls, beautiful beaches, and proximity to the Pakleni Islands.

locations.name: Split
locations.description: Final destination, a vibrant city built around the ancient Diocletian's Palace (UNESCO World Heritage site), featuring a bustling promenade and historical alleys.
